name: Twitch Mod Simulator
description: You think it's easy to be a twitch moderator huh? It's a warzone out there day in and day out. Theres the pressure of having to keep your streamer satisfied, having to watch the chat to ban haters and the competition between moderators. Truly, only a man with an unbreakable physical and mental can undertake such a profession. You think you can keep up with the chaotic pressure, well good luck soldier!
